description:
Find a balance between weight and durability. This versatile belay device has hard-wearing steel on the surfaces that touch the rope to prevent wear and dissipate heat after long rappels.

  • Lightweight aluminum housing and steel rope-bearing surfaces
  • V-shaped channels increase friction for thinner ropes, and increase holding power when belaying off the anchor
  • Configuration allows belaying a leader or bringing up 2 seconds
name: Mammut Nordwand Alpine Belay Device
